text: Núria Parlon Gil (born 2 August 1974) is a Spanish politician who belongs to the Socialists' Party of Catalonia. She has served as Mayor of Santa Coloma de Gramenet since 2009. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Socialists' Party of Catalonia politicians Category:20th- century women politicians Category:21st-century Spanish women politicians Category:Catalan women in politics Category:Members of the Parliament of Catalonia Category:Women mayors of places in Spain Category:Municipal councillors in the province of Barcelona Category:Mayors of places in Catalonia
title: Núria Parlón
